column1: Little Goat Diner////The food here is pretty good
column2: but the atmosphere is very much a hipster crowd. The breakfast menu is a bit limited. However if you want a diner brunch or breakfast
column3: this is not the place. If you want a trendy place to eat good food
column4: not a bad choice in a nice location. One warning
column5: the staff is a bit brusk
column6: but given how busy they are
